idea:
We are Govt. reg. electrical contractor with experience of industry more than 25-years. 

We provide following services to industrial, commercial customers located around Mumbai & Navi Mumbai.

Problem faced by Manufacturing Industries/Commercial Complexes/Factories/ Hospitals /Hotels/:

Electrical system breakdown 

Transformers 

Maintenance / AMC 

Lighting system 

Electrical DB’s 

Earthing system 

Voltage fluctuations 

Power protection (over voltage / over current / surge / neutral open) 

Electrical breaker panels / Switchgear panels 

IOT based energy monitoring

Energy related challenges

IOT based KVAh billing monitoring

Power factor correction / kVAh billing challenges

IOT based water tank operation

Motors related issues

IOT based vehicles monitoring system

Skilled / Semi-skilled / Unskilled manpower supply on our payroll basis (ESIC+PF+Safety compliences)

Features:

ü Prompt service

ü Expert solution

ü One stop solution for all your electrical service need

ü Reasonable pricing

AMC:

"We provide AMC for complete electrical system to single electrical panel or machine control panel as per customer requirement"

Some esteemed clients:

Govt. bodies: PWD, MCGM, BPCL, JNPT, Cotton corp. of India

Private sector: CEAT Tyre Ltd.,Gujrat Nippon Int. P. Ltd, Jubilant food works, L&T Automation, Apcotex Industries Ltd., Ferring Pharmaceuticals, Flip spaces, MANY MORE…………..
name: NIVEDEETA ELECTRICALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Pinsaar was founded because of conclusive research and experimentation of enterprise software applications that we conducted parallelly in our previous ventures. We have had a strong belief that conventional enterprise software solutions have failed at innovation and at accelerating growth of productivity in companies. We were determined to tackle this problem and help the entire globe to handle their routine operations with greater speed and lower costs.

Our experience spectrum spans satellite tracking, spaceflight simulation, high altitude helium balloons, drones, and robotics. Our dependence on high technology drove our interest in inventing techniques to innovate in the enterprise software sector.
name: PINSAAR SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
